name: F.R.A.P.S
description:
The game is set up as an intergalactic battle between two bots from different planets.The game is 2 player competitive experience and involves two stages.

The first stage is flying in space and using the power ups to destroy the opponent. The second phase involves a last man standing fight decided by adapting the concept of "Rock-Paper-Scissors".

This game was built in 3 weeks as a part of a graduate level course called Building Virtual Worlds by 6 students from Carnegie Mellon University's Entertainment Technology Center.
